furniture.Name: Olee Sleep 12 inch Hybrid Euro Box Top Pocket Spring Mattress
furniture.Description: Composed of 5 Layers Includes Pocket Spring, High density foam absorbs and disperse your weight, Your purchase includes One Olee Sleep Pegasus 12-Inch Euro Box Top Spring Mattress, in Full Size.

furniture.Description: Hand crafted metal dining chairs with Vintage PU Leather in Antique brown color, Set of 2.

furniture.Name: Home Office Desk, Modern Industrial Simple Style Computer Desk
furniture.Description: Modern Industrial design with simple pattern supplies plenty room for legs and work. Metal frame with MDF panel makes it qualified enough and suitable to be an office desk for carrying PCs, printers, and other purpose. It can be used as a study writing desk for college students or used in dorm, house etc.
